Sign in to your account

Use My Gloucester to view your council tax bill, check payments, and update your details online.

Sign in to My Gloucester

What you can do online

With your My Gloucester account, you can:

  • View your current council tax bill
  • Check your payment history
  • Set up or change a Direct Debit
  • Update your address when you move
  • Apply for discounts or exemptions
  • Sign up for paperless billing

Register for an online account

If you don't have a My Gloucester account yet, you can register online. You'll need:

  • ‚úì Your council tax account reference number (on your bill)
  • ‚úì Your postcode
  • ‚úì An email address

Register for My Gloucester

Paperless billing

Sign up for paperless billing to get your council tax bill by email instead of post.

Benefits of paperless billing

  • Receive your bill faster
  • Never lose your bill
  • Better for the environment
  • Access your bills anytime online

You can sign up for paperless billing through your My Gloucester account.

Account security

Keep your account safe:

  • Choose a strong password
  • Don't share your login details
  • Sign out when you're finished
  • Never click links in emails asking for your password

If you think someone else has accessed your account, change your password immediately and contact us.
